snippet: The new Big East will have a West Division, and Temple, in Philadelphia, will be part of it as the conference becomes a 12-team league for the 2013 football season.
abstract: Big East Conference adds a Western Division, becoming a 12-team league in 2013 college football season.
lead_paragraph: The new Big East will have a West Division, and Temple, in Philadelphia, will be part of it as the conference becomes a 12-team league for the 2013 football season.

headline.seo: For 2013 Football Season, New Big East to Have a West Division
headline.main: Big East to Have a West Division
headline.print_headline: Half of Big East Is West
